## Octree.removeNode() method

Removes a scene node from the octree

**Signature:**

```typescript
removeNode(node: GraphNode): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  node | [GraphNode](doc/markdown/./scene.graphnode.md) | The scene node to be removed |
